Text: WHAT PROGRAMME DID YOU USE TO CONVERT 2D TO 3D

I used DVDfab 8 Qt for the conversion. It is free-to-try, paid software but very good at what it does. I was impressed with the quality so I purchased, but you may find a copy out there hacked or something.
For those of you that have viewed this, can you please leave some feedback? I would like to know what you think.
Worked perfect & de kid enjoyed it..Cheers mate

Wow, thanks for all your work and purchasing the software johnsmith25.
PS. I can't wait for Cars 2 3D to be ripped :)
